website_summaries.verdict: Quality vitamins at a value price from a trusted name in the industry. Includes all major immune boosting vitamins+.
pros: A recognizable brand that comes in a variety of formulations for all ages
Ingredients are gluten-free and from non-GMO sources
Contains all necessary immune boosting vitamins and minerals in addition a number of others to maintain proper system functions
cons: Label doesn't indicate if they're organic or vegan

customer_reviews.title: Made me sick. Full of dangerous chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: There is no way this is non-GMO. I feel so fooled. I checked the ingredients on the back and it’s full of random chemicals and additives. They added talc famously known to be dangerous. Wake up!Plus it has gelatin which I don’t eat. There is nothing healthier about this product. It’s the same garbage as their other products. Plus after a week of using this product I have severe stomach cramping and an infection in my intestines. I threw up blood. Wtf!? You trying to kill us!? Stupid Pharma companies only care about their pockets and not the people they are fooling to buy their dangerous products with false-advertisements.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt give me any headaches, or belly ache, and I still go to tbe bathroom. I do feel more energy, makes me feel much better. I was scare to try this when I read all the reviews, but once I tried it so far its all good. I have been taking it for like a month. The reason I started taking this was because I always felt weak, couldnt focus at work, i constantly had to push myself to get things done. Now with this vitamin i feel very focus, and energized, some people have even asked me if I lost weight, I dont really think I have. I will continue taking them and see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Real critic

customer_reviews.title: Must take with food
customer_reviews.text: If you're prone to gassiness or gastrointestinal problems, you must take this with food. Whenever I don't I get the worse stomach pains. Very unbearable because I'd like to be able to take by itself since I'm on the go often and might not have time for a full meal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest effective multi-vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a expiration date nearly two years out from purchase. No issues there. Haven't found a single multivitamin close to this price effective.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: They Made Me Sick
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product for about a week and every time I took one (with food), it made me sick to my stomach, headache and had muscle cramps. It's a great brand, so a little confused why my body didn't like it. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Hill

customer_reviews.title: Constipation
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, this supplement gave me constipation. Could be due to the form of iron they used. Stopped taking it and my digestion was regular again. Not a good fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Horrible stomach pain
customer_reviews.text: Both my lady and I had horrible stomach pain about 20 minutes after taking the vitamins. This happened several times until we opted for a different brand. I wouldn't buy these for my worst enemy.
customer_reviews.author: Whitehaze

customer_reviews.title: Made us feel sick
customer_reviews.text: I started to feel sick the day I started taking these supplements - but I thought that I might have caught a virus. It impacted my wellbeing for a few days (dizziness, fatigue, headache, stomach problems) until I realized that after I took them, always after lunch, I had the same kind of stomach ache. I stopped, and I am feeling better. Today two other family members took them, and had exactly the same symptoms I had. Amazon's return policy is wonderful, however I would like to know what exactly impacted our wellbeing. I have been taking supplements my whole life, also heavy B-complex when needed, and never had any issue.
customer_reviews.author: leeway

customer_reviews.title: I guess they're good?
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these multi vitamins off and on for many years and they seem fine. None of them arrived broken or anything and although I don't notice a difference in myself either way, I assume they are doing what they are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S

customer_reviews.title: They are vitamin pills that don't taste bad
customer_reviews.text: I got them on time and there is no bad taste or smell. They have a smooth coating but there is a very tiny amount of pill powder in the bottle, it was bothersome with the first pill but not anymore. I hope they do what they are supposed to. Since I don't have a mass spectrometer, I'll believe the nutrition label lol
customer_reviews.author: Gopes

customer_reviews.title: Broken Seal
customer_reviews.text: I've used Centrum before and have been happy with their products. Unfortunately, my most recent order came with the seal on the container broken/ripped; some of the pills inside were also crushed. Considering that the shipping container and rest of my items were un-damaged, it seems to be a quality concern with Centrum alone. I hope the problem is only temporary as I really enjoy the multivitamin line.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: It says take with food and I took it right before my meal and I nearly threw up. I tried again after and the same thing. This new formula is terrible and causes intense abdominal pain DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Irvin

customer_reviews.title: price is good, would buy again for
customer_reviews.text: This one has almost everything and you only need one acceptable sized pill a day, plus it is a very well known brand, price is good, would buy again for sure
customer_reviews.author: JOSE EMANUEL GAZZANO SENDRA

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: It is dangerous. As soon as i take it, i started to feel bad in my stomach. Then for long hours feeling bad in my chest. Then i woke up in middle of night feeling terrible and my hands was hot. Don't take it even for free.
customer_reviews.author: Mitra

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: After researching Centrum vitamins I found out they are actually very bad for you. Do yourself a favor and research it and if you still want to buy it, then good luck. Also I tried to do a return and it won't let me, so money lost as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's worth the stomach nauseousness
customer_reviews.text: I'm on day 3 of taking these and yes, they do make you feel nauseous. It's not an extreme feeling as though you drank too much, but it IS noticeable. I take it in the morning when I wake up and as I drink my coffee the feeling goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Stomach pain
customer_reviews.text: I too have been experiencing stomach pain every single time I take this. 😞 I take it the moment I finish breakfast. Not sure what's causing the stomachache. - 27 y.o. athletic male
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Made me sick
customer_reviews.text: This really upsets my stomach. Several times it made me so nauseous that I threw up. Not a good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Causes intense and very unpleasant gastrointestinal issues
customer_reviews.text: Stay far away from these! After taking 1 (even with food as is recommended) it tears apart my stomach. Unbearable cramps and nausea that last well over an hour. Total waste of money and a scam. I have no idea what is in here that makes these so unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: My skin started itching all over
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew if it was from a fillerCentrum uses or one of the minerals but within the hour of taking this my skin started itching all over. I tried it 3 different days to be sure it was the culprit and same reaction each time. Tried to send it back but no returns so I hope the next brand I try will work for me
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins. Just like fake doors. Don't even think about it.
customer_reviews.text: Vitamins. You need them to make up for the nutrients you don't always get in your food. These are a lot. I swallow them so I don't taste them.
customer_reviews.author: Chihiro

customer_reviews.title: How does one calculate absorbency within a star rating system?
customer_reviews.text: All my life I was told to eat vitamins. Ok, sounds good. Hulk Hogan didn't specify which brand, but Centrum is EVERYWHERE. They taste like rocks made of nearly(nearly) tasteless chemicals. Someone tell me how to tell if I am absorbing these at the five stars I ranked it? I detect no trace of them in my stool. In my eyes, that's 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Yawgmoth

customer_reviews.title: Good multivitamin.
customer_reviews.text: With one pill a day you feel the change in the body a week, it really includes all the nutrients it says. The container is small and fits anywhere to take it to work or travel I do not give five stars because the capsules are a little big and difficult to take, otherwise everything is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Centrum Knows About This
customer_reviews.text: Centrum is very aware that this product causes stomach aches and deletes any review relating to this issue and moves product to a new listing. Don't take my word for it check it out yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: If Healthcare was only this affordable.
customer_reviews.text: What every male needs daily a multivitamin. Centrum is one of the top brands. Great price for health. If Obama or Trump or anyone else could make Healthcare this affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Knowitall

customer_reviews.title: Contains artificial colors
customer_reviews.text: Contains Yellow Lake 6 artificial coloring which causes hyperactivity in children. Should not be in a health food. We only discovered it after we got pains in stomach. Cannot return it so beware.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: It is really heavy for the stomach and it dones contain talc
customer_reviews.text: Everytime I take the tablet, my stomach immediately feels it. It is really strong for your stomach even if you take it with the lunch. On the other hand, I read the ingredients and it contains talc which is a really polemic ingredient, associated with cancer. Looking at the bright side, I have been feeling with more energy (no big difference tho) and the price is pretty good. I would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Strange reaction
customer_reviews.text: After taking our local store generic version, switched to the actual Centrum product. Weird reaction to something in it. Have stopped taking it, and, after a week, symptom gone.
customer_reviews.author: JBA

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a good purchase but no, because i did not read the bad reviews, they were right stomach ache after swallowing the pill , do not purchase save yourself of this ache with bothersome
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Ideales para adultos.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother and are very complete in the formulation and all vitamins we need. They are a little rustic and big, personally I prefer the gummies presentation because they have better taste and are easy to take. But If you like this kind of vitamins, they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Ninna

customer_reviews.title: Bad stomachaches.
customer_reviews.text: I get a bad stomachache immediately after taking any of these. I’ve never had this problem with any other multivitamin. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDragon64

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED DATE IS ONLY COUPLE MONTHS AWAY
customer_reviews.text: They sent me 200 pills that will expired in 6 months!!! Not happy with it! make sure you check expiry dates

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended unless you want stomach ache
customer_reviews.text: Terrible stomach ache, I don't know the reason but it happens every time. Definitely not recommended
customer_reviews.author: David A

customer_reviews.title: Stomach ache no matter how you take it
customer_reviews.text: My wife would complain about the stomach ache she was getting every time she took the capsule. I was stubborn enough to ignore the uncomfortable feeling in my stomach but after a few days and feeling worse every time, we decided to give up and call it a loss and switch to gummies. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Pooyan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase, made me throw up within minutes of taking every time. My boyfriend tried them twice and it made him sick both times as well. Taken on a full stomach so that wasn’t a factor.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Trust is Everything
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to the vitamins I put in my body, I want a name I trust. Centrum is that name. I may pay a little more. But I sleep better at night and I feel better.

customer_reviews.title: My dad has heart disease and this product would only make it worse!!
customer_reviews.text: HAS HYDROGENATED PALM OIL AS AN INGREDIENT!! BUYER BEWARE!!! My dad has heart disease and this product would only make it worse!!!

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! Please consider the following: place all the centrum options in one page. I wasn't noticed that ther is a centrum for men under 50 therefore, i would need to wait in order tu buy the correct one. Thanks, indeed it is a great product! Regards,
customer_reviews.author: lemel

customer_reviews.title: Great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I reorder these for my dad and my grandma every 3 months. Been over a year now and the price is great and their vitamin levels are coming back better. They are large pills but my grandma is 92 and she gets them down ok. Make sure you drink lots of water when taking it and it will be easier.

customer_reviews.title: Upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: Gave me a stomach ache. Read all the negative reviews and took a chance. Immediately regretted buying these vitamins.

customer_reviews.title: No pro, No cons
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen anything different by taking the vitamins. It does not have any flavor, which I like and the absorbency is great.

customer_reviews.title: Upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: Every time I took this or someone in my house took it, it caused a major stomachache. Don’t recommend

customer_reviews.title: NOT easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I have never had problems swallowing any pills at all, but these just refuse to go down. I even broke them in half, and they still won't go down. And they won't even let you return them (probably because they know everyone will return them since the pills can't be swallowed). I will not be buying these ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: MIGHT BE TOXIC AND UNHEALTHY TO CONSUME
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, i've trying this multivitamin for a month and it supposed to make me feel better and with energy but the only thing that makes me feel it's sick, my stomach hurts and makes me feel with nauseas everyday, now i can's stand the smell of the pills, my body its rejecting it in all ways posible.

customer_reviews.title: Usual Centrum, same price as Walmart
customer_reviews.text: Centrum personally makes my stomach hurt, so that isn't my favorite, but I need a multivitamin and Centrum is a trusted brand+this is the same price as at Walmart.

customer_reviews.title: Never order again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product a month ago and I been eating it for almost a month. I saw this green dots on all of my pills. I feel disgusting and it is expired on 2021. I will never order it again!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Stomach pain
customer_reviews.text: Stomach pain after having this. I have tried immediately after meal as well and still hurts
customer_reviews.author: Sasanka

customer_reviews.title: Feel really great since I've been taking these
customer_reviews.text: It's like oiling a machine except this being a body instead. My joints feel and move much better since I've started taking these.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon cheek

customer_reviews.title: Stomach pain, guaranteed!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins give me stomach pain lasting about 15 minutes every time I take them, without fault. Does not matter if I take with a small snack, large meal or no food at all. Every single time. I am not prone to stomach issues in general and no other vitamin does this to my stomach. The pain begins about 5 minutes after swallowing and gradually subsides over the next 15 minutes. Not the worst pain ever but very frustrating nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Upsets my stomach
customer_reviews.text: I follow the directions, but still it really upsets my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for EXPIRED pills!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought in May 2019 2bottles of 200 capsules to take to my brother in June (we live abroad). Well, to our surprise, we've got the bottles to expire in *July 2019*!!! A complete waste of money! You take these pills once a day, it's beyond ridiculous and outrageous that they even ship those out!!! :/
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Hurts your stomach
customer_reviews.text: I've never had an issue with any vitamins or supplements but these hurt my stomach about 5 minutes after taking. I tried taking them twice and each time I instantly had a stomach ache. It happened to my husband too. I will not buy these again.

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: Horrible stomach pain even when i take it with full stomach & I tried also to cut it into half but it’s still very painful

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! Sold bottles are expired or about to expire.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these bottles at the end of February, with all the pandemic craziness. I did not look at the expiration date. When I went to open one today it was already expired, just a few months after purchase of a product that is supposed to last for 300 days (300 pills, 1 a day). This is outrageous.

customer_reviews.title: Stomachaches and faint
customer_reviews.text: It makes my stomach hurt so much and I feel like I'm going to faint. My husband felt the same, we tried with and without food, it doesn't matter, the results are the same=stomachaches

customer_reviews.title: Anti-Rona pills

customer_reviews.title: Stay away

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins

product_meta.title: Centrum Adult Multivitamin/Multimineral Supplement with Antioxidants, Zinc and B Vitamins - 200 Count
product_meta.description: Size:200 Count (Pack of 1)Centrum Adult Multivitamin is a complete multivitamin/multimineral supplement for adults, with key micronutrients to feed your cells and help support your energy, immunity and metabolism. With Centrum's highest levels of vitamin D3, a preferred form of vitamin D, these adult multivitamins help fill nutritional gaps and promote whole body health. These non GMO, gluten free vitamins contain antioxidant vitamins C, E and zinc for immunity support. Each adult vitamin tablet also delivers vitamin B and iron as energy supplements and to aid in the metabolism of fats, carbohydrates and proteins. Support your body head to toe by taking one tablet with food every day. Feed your cells, fuel your life with Centrum, the #1 doctor and pharmacist recommended brand. Satisfaction Guarantee - If for any reason you are not satisfied with any GSK Consumer Healthcare product, GSK Consumer Healthcare will provide you with a reimbursement within 45 days of the date of purchase. Please note that because GSK is unable to control the quality of our products sold by unauthorized sellers, the Guarantee is not available for products purchased from unauthorized sellers due to potential quality issues outside GSK’s control. Please contact GSK Consumer Healthcare directly for more information.
